summary: Night-shift apex dispatcher: 15+ years weaponizing TMW/PeopleNet, Python automation, and DOT/HOS compliance to eliminate deadhead miles, maximize fleet ROI, and keep 150+ bulk tankers moving with surgical precision.

bullets: Dispatched 60+ outbound ag-bulk loads nightly; leveraged TMW analog to lock in 99% on-time delivery to Walmart/Costco DCs.
Automated driver log auditing with Python scripts—cut HOS violations 38%.
Maintained 20-driver night roster; reduced dwell time 30% via dynamic rerouting around Central Valley fog closures.
Built REST API bridges between dispatch software and telematics; scraped GPS pings to surface idle-time outliers in real time.
Hardened authentication with JWT/Okta, protecting 100k+ driver PII records.
Negotiated 500-carrier network; matched bulk liquid hazmat loads inside 15-min window, boosting margin 12%.
Integrated new TMS, automated rate indexing; trimmed data-entry overhead 25%.

education: A.S. Computer Science (in progress) – Modesto Junior College
